alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 3:32AM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches expected. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Laramie and Platte Counties including the cities of Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs, and Wheatland. This also includes the central and southern Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills. In Nebraska, Kimball and Banner counties including the cities of Kimball and Harrisburg. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to slick, snow packed roadways and significantly reduced visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
